Question: This person plays on the Internet Chess Club, and has taken lessons from chess master Dan Heisman.
Hints: The new contract allowed this person to work a reduced schedule from four to three-day working weeks.
In December 2010, this person re-signed his contract with Sirius to continue his show for a further five years.
Originally set for a 2000 release, this person starred as Orinthal, a family dog.
